name: Repository Access Control Evidence
description: Provide evidence that source code repositories implement appropriate access controls including user permissions matrices, branch protection rules, and deployment environment access restrictions to ensure only authorized personnel can access and modify code.
guidance:
The repository access control evidence should demonstrate that:
i) Repository access follows the principle of least privilege with documented permission levels (read, write, admin) assigned based on job role and business need.
ii) Branch protection rules prevent unauthorized direct commits to production branches and enforce code review requirements.
iii) Deployment environment access is restricted with appropriate approval workflows for production deployments.
iv) Administrative access to repositories is limited to designated personnel.
v) Repository permissions are reviewed periodically and access is revoked promptly when no longer needed.

related_controls.name: Access Control - User Registration and Provisioning
related_controls.description: Access requires documented request and approval prior to provisioning.

related_controls.name: Access Control - Access Termination and Modification
related_controls.description: Access is revoked timely when employment terminates.

related_policies.name: Access Control Policy
related_policies.description: System Access Control and User Management Policy.

requirements: Repository permissions matrix showing user access levels
Branch protection rule configurations for production branches
Deployment environment access controls and approval requirements
List of repository administrators and their justification
Repository access logs showing access grants and revocations
Organization member list with role assignments
acceptance_criteria: Repository access follows least privilege with documented roles
Protected branches require pull request reviews before merge
Direct commits to main/production branches are prohibited
Deployment to production requires explicit approval
Repository admin access limited to < 5 personnel
Access reviews conducted quarterly with documented results
Terminated employees removed from organization within 24 hours
